edu.iu.dsc.tws.api.compute.graph

Class ComputeGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iu.dsc.tws.api.compute.graph.BaseDataflowTaskGraph<Vertex,Edge>
      • edu.iu.dsc.tws.api.compute.graph.ComputeGraph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITaskGraph<Vertex,Edge>

    public class ComputeGraph
extends BaseDataflowTaskGraph<Vertex,Edge>
    This class extends the base data flow task graph which is mainly responsible for building the task graph for the task vertex and the task edge.

    todo redundant ComputeGraph <- BaseDataflowTaskGraph <- ITaskGraph chain
